properties.entry: SELECT TO_NUMBER(ROWNUM) , NICKNAME , "SUMTIME" , PROFILE_IMG FROM ( SELECT NICKNAME , TO_NUMBER(RANK() OVER (ORDER BY SUM(S_TIME) DESC)) "RANKING" , TO_CHAR(SUM(S_TIME), '999990,00,00' )"SUMTIME" , PROFILE_IMG FROM MEMBER_TIMER JOIN MEMBER USING(USER_NO) WHERE TO_CHAR(S_DAY, 'yyyymmdd') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-1, 'yyyymmdd') AND USER_TYPE = 'U' GROUP BY USER_NO, PROFILE_IMG, NICKNAME ORDER BY RANK() OVER (ORDER BY SUM(S_TIME) DESC)) WHERE TO_NUMBER(ROWNUM) <= ?

SELECT "RANKING" , NICKNAME , "SUMTIME" , PROFILE_IMG FROM ( SELECT NICKNAME , TO_NUMBER(RANK() OVER (ORDER BY SUM(S_TIME) DESC)) "RANKING" , TO_CHAR(SUM(S_TIME), '999990,00,00' )"SUMTIME" , PROFILE_IMG , USER_NO FROM MEMBER_TIMER JOIN MEMBER USING(USER_NO) WHERE TO_CHAR(S_DAY,'yyyymmdd') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-1,'yyyymmdd') AND USER_TYPE = 'U' GROUP BY USER_NO, PROFILE_IMG, NICKNAME ORDER BY RANK() OVER (ORDER BY SUM(S_TIME) DESC)) WHERE USER_NO = ?

SELECT TO_NUMBER(ROWNUM) , NICKNAME , "SUMTIME" , PROFILE_IMG FROM ( SELECT NICKNAME , TO_NUMBER(RANK() OVER (ORDER BY SUM(S_TIME) DESC)) "RANKING" , TO_CHAR(SUM(S_TIME), '999990,00,00' )"SUMTIME" , PROFILE_IMG FROM MEMBER_TIMER JOIN MEMBER USING(USER_NO) WHERE TO_CHAR(S_DAY, 'yyyymmdd') >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE- ?, 'yyyymmdd') AND USER_TYPE = 'U' GROUP BY USER_NO, PROFILE_IMG, NICKNAME ORDER BY RANK() OVER (ORDER BY SUM(S_TIME) DESC)) WHERE TO_NUMBER(ROWNUM) <= 10

SELECT "RANKING" , NICKNAME , "SUMTIME" , PROFILE_IMG FROM ( SELECT NICKNAME , TO_NUMBER(RANK() OVER (ORDER BY SUM(S_TIME) DESC)) "RANKING" , TO_CHAR(SUM(S_TIME), '999990,00,00' )"SUMTIME" , PROFILE_IMG , USER_NO FROM MEMBER_TIMER JOIN MEMBER USING(USER_NO) WHERE TO_CHAR(S_DAY, 'yyyymmdd') >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-?, 'yyyymmdd') AND USER_TYPE = 'U' GROUP BY USER_NO, PROFILE_IMG, NICKNAME ORDER BY RANK() OVER (ORDER BY SUM(S_TIME) DESC)) WHERE USER_NO = ?

SELECT TO_NUMBER(ROWNUM) , NICKNAME , "SUMTIME" , PROFILE_IMG FROM ( SELECT NICKNAME , TO_NUMBER(RANK() OVER (ORDER BY SUM(S_TIME) DESC)) "RANKING" , TO_CHAR(SUM(S_TIME), '999990,00,00' )"SUMTIME" , PROFILE_IMG FROM MEMBER_TIMER JOIN MEMBER USING(USER_NO) WHERE TO_CHAR(S_DAY, 'yyyymmdd') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-1, 'yyyymmdd') AND USER_TYPE = 'U' AND S_NO = ? GROUP BY USER_NO, PROFILE_IMG, NICKNAME ORDER BY RANK() OVER (ORDER BY SUM(S_TIME) DESC)) WHERE TO_NUMBER(ROWNUM) <= 10

GROUP BY USER_NO, PROFILE_IMG, NICKNAME ORDER BY RANK() OVER (ORDER BY SUM(S_TIME) DESC)) WHERE TO_NUMBER(ROWNUM) <= 10

GROUP BY USER_NO, PROFILE_IMG, NICKNAME ORDER BY RANK() OVER (ORDER BY SUM(S_TIME) DESC)) WHERE USER_NO = ?

SELECT "RANKING" , NICKNAME , "SUMTIME" , PROFILE_IMG FROM ( SELECT NICKNAME , TO_NUMBER(RANK() OVER (ORDER BY SUM(S_TIME) DESC)) "RANKING" , TO_CHAR(SUM(S_TIME), '999990,00,00' )"SUMTIME" , PROFILE_IMG , USER_NO FROM MEMBER_TIMER JOIN MEMBER USING(USER_NO) WHERE TO_CHAR(S_DAY, 'yyyymmdd') >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE- ?, 'yyyymmdd') AND USER_TYPE = 'U' AND S_NO = ? GROUP BY USER_NO, PROFILE_IMG, NICKNAME ORDER BY RANK() OVER (ORDER BY SUM(S_TIME) DESC)) WHERE USER_NO = ?
